text: Also driving without AC saves fuel
If u back all the way to the stopper  shifting to neutral release the vehicle being engaged in a pushed up position against the stopper
So when u engage P  it will be in a more neutral pos rather than it being cramped up against the stopper forcing the brakes in a engaged position
